caption.p: Box plots showing global distribution of contribution from each source of uncertainty to the total spread of drought persistence error for monthly (red) and annual (blue) scales. Each box represents the interquartile range, and the median is shown as white line. The whiskers show the range (25th quantile −1.5·IQR, 75th quantile +1.5·IQR), and values outside this range are indicated as dots.
